_meanings:
Subsisting in 
different receptacles or substrata; (as
in {#vyaDikaraRabahuvrIhi#} which means
‘a Bahuvrīhi compound, the first
member of which is not in 
apposition, or stands in a different 
caserelation, to the second, in the 
dissolution of the compound; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%}  
{#cakrapARiH, caMdramOliH#} &c.)
